item.description:
If you ever had an interest in shooting classic nude photography in a comfortable, and professional setting this meetup is perfect. It is also a great event for the seasoned photographer looking to expand his/her portfolio with some great models and sets. As a special bonus there will be a classic trained artist/painter that will assist with and suggest traditional and classic posing styles.

The location will be in a commercial studio (see studio photos) and weather permitting a private courtyard Garden Image immediately adjacent to the studio. The style of shooting will range from classic to avant garde. We will not be shooting anything suggestive of pornographic or trash.

As per our previous events, we will using paid experienced models that offer a range of posing styles. To see some sample photos please click here.

The event will run 4 hours from 10AM to 2PM. There will be a 3:1 photographer to model ratio. The event will be run such that each photographer will have focused time with the models. This means that no other photographer will be permitted to shoot while you are shooting. Estimated images per photographer will be 250-400 images.

There will be free (no charge) pre-meetup workshop from 9AM-10AM to discuss and review studio lighting. If you are interested in attendig this workshop, please let me know. It will only be open to the 1st 5 photographers that contact me.

If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to contact me.

Jerry
thebitbucket@comcast.net
781.771.3101
item.name: Nude and Topless Workshop
